alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 10:25AM EDT until April 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWEST PENNSYLVANIA... The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 8 PM EDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 001 Northern Erie, Fire Weather Zone 002 Southern Erie and Fire Weather Zone 003 Crawford. * TIMING...Through this evening. * WINDS...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower to upper 70s. * IMPACTS...Rapid wildfire growth and spread expected. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning is issued when critical fire weather conditions are occurring or are imminent. A combination of winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire spread and fire behavior. For more information about wildfire danger, burn restrictions, and wildfire prevention and education, please visit the Pennsylvania Department of Conservation and Natural Resources website at http://dcnr.pa.gov/Communities/Wildfire.
